li.text: WETFCT - Wetting factor
LAYTYP(NLAY) - a flag indicating layer typd
LAYAVG(NLAY) - a flag indicating the method of calculating interblock transmissivity
CHANI(NLAY) - a flag indicating that HANI should be used or the horizontal anisotropy
LAYVKA(NLAY) - a flag that indicates the meaning of the variable VKA
LAYWET(NLAY) - a flag indicates if wetting is active
LAYSTRT(NLAY) - a flag indicating that a convertible layer is to be treated as confined.

para.text: 0 - don't treat convertible layer as confined.

li.text: LAYFLG(6,NLAY)

para.text: LAYFLG(1,*) - Print code for HK when HK parameters are used
LAYFLG(2,*) - Print code for VKA when VK or VANI parameters are used
LAYFLG(3,*) - Print code for SS when SS parameters are used
LAYFLG(4,*) - Print code for SY when SY parameters are used
LAYFLG(5,*) - Print code for VKCB when VKCB parameters are used
LAYFLG(6,*) - Print code for HANI when HANI parameters are used and CHANI(*) is less than or equal to zero

li.text: VKA(NCOL,NROW,NLAY) - is either vertical hydraulic conductivity or the ratio of horizontal to vertical hydraulic conductivity depending on the value of LAYVKA
VKCB(NCOL,NROW,NCNFBD) - is the vertical hydraulic conductivity of a Quasi-three-dimensional confining bed below a layer.
SC1(NCOL,NROW,NLAY) - Specific Storage or Storage Coefficient
SC2(NCOL,NROW,NCNVRT) (NCNVRT = number of convertible layers) - Specific Yield
HANI(NCOL,NROW,NHANI) (NHANI = number of layers for which HANI is used)- Horizontal anisotropy

WETDRY(NCOL,NROW,NWETD) (NWETD = number of layers for which WETDRY is used) - WETDRY is a combination of the wetting threshold and a flag to indicate which neighboring cells can cause a cell to become wet.
HK(NCOL,NROW,NLAY) - horizontal hydraulic conductivity

GWF2LPF7AR - Allocate and Read Data for Layer Property Flow Package
GWF2LPF7AD - Set Hold to BOTM Whenever a Wettable Cell is Dry
GWF2LPF7FM - Add Leakage Correction and Storage to HCOF and RHS, and Calculate Conductance as Required.
SGWF2LPF7N - Initialize and Check LPF Data
GWF2LPF7BDADJ - Compute Flow Between Adjacent Cells in a Subregion of the Grid
GWF2LPF7BDS - Compute Storage Budget Flow Term for LPF
GWF2LPF7BDCH - Compute Flow from Constant-Head Cells
SGWF2LPF7SC - Compute Storage Capacity
SGWF2LPF7HCOND - Compute Horizontal Branch Conductance for One Layer
SGWF2LPF7WET - Convert Dry Cells to Wet.
SGWF2LPF7WDMSG - Print Message When Cells Convert Between Wet and Dry.
SGWF2LPF7HHARM - Compute Horizontal Branch Conductance Using Harmonic Mean of Block Conductances (Distance Weighted Harmonic Mean of Transmissivity). Cell Thickness is in CC Upon Entry.
SGWF2LPF7HLOG - Compute Horizontal Conductance Using Logarithmic Mean Transmissivity -- Activated By LAYAVG=1 Cell Saturated Thickness is in CC.
SGWF2LPF7HUNCNF - Compute Horizontal Conductance Using Arithmetic Mean Saturated Thickness and Logarithmic Mean Hydraulic Conductivity. Cell Saturated Thickness is in CC. Activated By LAYAVG=2
SGWF2LPF7VCOND - Compute Vertical Branch Conductance Between a Layer and the Next Lower Layer from Vertical Hydraulic Conductivity.
SGWF2LPF7CK - Check That Just-defined Parameter of Type 'VK' or 'VANI' is Used Consistently With LAYVKA Entries for Layers Listed in Clusters for the Parameter
GWF2LPF7DA - Deallocate LPF Data
SGWF2LPF7PNT - Point to LPF data for a grid.
GWF2LPF7PSV - Save LPF data for a grid.
